data.title: bd-355: Add workspace metadata storage
data.description:
Adds support for storing metadata (owner, notes, tags, task_id) with each workspace via a .maw-meta TOML file.

Changes:
- Add WorkspaceMeta struct with owner, created_at, notes, tags, task_id
- Store as TOML in .workspaces/<name>/.maw-meta
- Add 'maw ws meta' subcommand with show/set/tag/untag actions
- Auto-create metadata on workspace creation
- Show metadata (owner, tags) in verbose list output

Testing:
- All 8 workspace validation tests pass
- Manual testing confirmed meta commands work
